name: Faceless (itch) (usaagi) (usaagi)
description:
Faceless is a serialized hypertext novel: it's mostly words, some of which you can click on to reveal more words, and it comes out in parts. It involves a disillusioned graphic designer, powerful demons working for the government, and a futuristic beach city in the 90s.

It features:

  • A story reminiscent of an action-adventure comic book
  • A kickin' original soundtrack composed by the author
  • Philosophical rambling
  • Did I mention the soundtrack?

Updates should come out every week if all goes well.
